podcasts.name: Brain Sparks
podcasts.description: This podcast is hosted by usability and UI design expert, Jared Spool. It offers tona of value with many industry leaders sharing insights on usability, UX design, and UI design.
podcasts.title: The Tension of Art and Science When Communicating Complex User Research

podcasts.name: The Dirt Show
podcasts.description: The Dirt Show is a podcast hosted by the team behind the UX design agency, Fresh Tilled Soil. One cool thing about this podcast is some topics follow a mini-series format, with multiple episodes and different guests talking about the same topic. For example, they have a mini-series on topics such as "designing your career" and "designing the future".
podcasts.title: Data-Driven Design with James Aylward of Pluralsight

podcasts.name: UX Podcast
podcasts.description: UX Podcast is for people passionate about balancing business, technology and users within the realm of digital media. Moving the conversation beyond the traditional realm of User Experience.
podcasts.title: The state of accessibility with Derek Featherstone

podcasts.name: UX Pod
podcasts.description: Gerry Gaffney set up the User Experience podcast in 2006, with a view to providing a platform for discussing topics of interest to practitioners or others with an interest in UX.
podcasts.title: Running a virtual conference: An interview with Rory Madden

podcasts.name: UX Mastery
podcasts.description: UX Mastery is a website that hosts a lot of useful articles and content related to user experience design. The site also has an infrequently updated podcast.
podcasts.title: Design Decisions with Tom Greever

podcasts.name: UX Discovery Session
podcasts.description: A discovery session is an opportunity to learn about a relevant topic, generate ideas that expand a new technique or practice, or brainstorm concepts and ideas for the next new thing.
podcasts.title: Di Dang, New Technologies Design Advocate at Google

podcasts.name: React Podcast
podcasts.description: Conversations about React with your favorite developers.
podcasts.title: Cassidy Williams on Dreams and Disasters in 2020

podcasts.name: Javascript Jabber
podcasts.description: Weekly podcast discussion about Javascript on the front and back ends.
podcasts.title: The Things Every JavaScript Developer Must Know, Part 2

podcasts.name: JS Party
podcasts.description: a weekly celebration of JavaScript and the web
podcasts.title: Modern JS tooling is too complicated. Yep? Nope?

podcasts.description: Conversations with the hackers, leaders, and innovators of the software world
podcasts.title: The Pragmatic Programmers

podcasts.name: Developer Tea

podcasts.title: Misusing Exceptions in Code and in Life
